name: FPS Sword Game
description:
A game made for the FPS Mini Jam.

Fight monsters in this arena-like world. Use your sword or your fists to kill them all! Set new highscores and prove your skill! Don't get too close to them or they might kill you before you can kill them.

What do you say? Do you think you can take on the infinite spawning monsters? If so, good luck brave soul!
